mapper.select:
SELECT pa.party_name AS REG, si.`customer_ID` AS SHOP_ID ,si.`CUSTOMER_NAME` AS DEALER, si.`CREATE_DATE` AS DATE, (SELECT p.party_name FROM party p WHERE p.party_id=pa.`PARENT_PARTY_ID`) AREA
FROM customer_info si
JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = si.party_id
ORDER BY si.`Customer_NAME` ASC

SELECT sp.`salertype` AS salerType ,u.user_Name AS userId ,ci.`CUSTOMER_ID` AS shop_id FROM shop_saler_mapping sp JOIN user_login u ON u.user_login_id=sp.`user_login_id` JOIN shop_info si ON si.`SHOP_ID`=sp.`shop_id`
JOIN customer_info ci ON ci.`CUSTOMER_ID`=si.`CUSTOMER_ID` JOIN party pa ON pa.`PARTY_ID`=si.`PARTY_ID`

SELECT pa.`PARTY_ID` partyId, PA.`PARTY_NAME` AS AREA ,
${"round(COALESCE(SUM(S.`h_quantity`),0) )AS saleQty, COALESCE(SUM(S.`h_amount`),0) AS saleSum"}
${"round(COALESCE(SUM(S.`quantity`),0) )AS saleQty, COALESCE(SUM(S.`amount`),0) AS saleSum"}
, COUNT(DISTINCT s.shop_id) noOfShops, COALESCE(SUM(smtv.fps ),0) AS tvFps
FROM t_sale s FORCE INDEX(idx_sale_shopdatadate)
JOIN customer_info ci ON ci.customer_id=s.`customer_id`
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT cii.customer_id AS shop, COUNT(DISTINCT sm.`user_login_id`) AS FPS FROM shop_saler_mapping sm JOIN t_sale t FORCE INDEX(idx_sale_shopdatadate) ON t.`shop_id`=sm.`shop_id` JOIN customer_info cii ON cii.customer_id=t.`customer_id` JOIN shop_info psi ON psi.`customer_id`=cii.`customer_id` JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id=cii.party_id
AND t.datadate BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} AND sm.salertype='1' GROUP BY cii.`customer_id` ) smtv ON smtv.shop=ci.`customer_id`
JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = ci.party_id JOIN t_modelmap tm ON tm.`branch_model`=s.model AND tm.`party_id`=pa.`COUNTRY_ID` JOIN t_modelmap_channel tmc ON tmc.`branch_model`=tm.`branch_model` AND tmc.`party_id`=tm.`party_id` AND tmc.customer_id=ci.customer_id JOIN product pr ON pr.product_model=tm.`hq_model` AND pr.head_type_id =1
AND s.datadate BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} AND pr.head_type_id=1 GROUP BY ci.party_Id

SELECT pa.`PARTY_ID` partyId, PA.`PARTY_NAME` AS AREA ,
${"round(COALESCE(SUM(S.`h_quantity`),0) )AS saleQty, COALESCE(SUM(S.`h_amount`),0) AS saleSum"}
${"round(COALESCE(SUM(S.`quantity`),0) )AS saleQty, COALESCE(SUM(S.`amount`),0) AS saleSum"}
, COUNT(DISTINCT s.shop_id) noOfShops, COALESCE(SUM(smtv.fps ),0) AS tvFps
FROM t_sale s FORCE INDEX(idx_sale_shopdatadate)
JOIN customer_info ci ON ci.customer_id=s.`customer_id`
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT cii.customer_id AS shop, COUNT(DISTINCT sm.`user_login_id`) AS FPS FROM shop_saler_mapping sm JOIN t_sale t FORCE INDEX(idx_sale_shopdatadate) ON t.`shop_id`=sm.`shop_id` JOIN customer_info cii ON cii.customer_id=t.`customer_id` JOIN shop_info psi ON psi.`customer_id`=cii.`customer_id` JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id=cii.party_id
AND t.datadate BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} AND sm.salertype='1' GROUP BY cii.`customer_id` ) smtv ON smtv.shop=ci.`customer_id`
JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = ci.party_id JOIN t_modelmap tm ON tm.`branch_model`=s.model AND tm.`party_id`=pa.`COUNTRY_ID` JOIN t_modelmap_channel tmc ON tmc.`branch_model`=tm.`branch_model` AND tmc.`party_id`=tm.`party_id` AND tmc.customer_id=ci.customer_id JOIN product pr ON pr.product_model=tm.`hq_model` AND pr.head_type_id =1
AND s.datadate BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} AND pr.head_type_id=2 GROUP BY ci.party_Id

SELECT pa.`PARTY_ID` partyId, PA.`PARTY_NAME` AS AREA
FROM customer_info p JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = p.party_id
GROUP BY PA.`PARTY_ID`

SELECT sv.userId, sv.userName AS userName,SUM( sv.shop) AS noOfShops ,
COALESCE(SUM(sv.saleQty),0) AS saleQty, COALESCE(SUM(sv.saleSum),0) AS saleSum, COALESCE(SUM(tv.targetSum),0) AS targetSum , COALESCE(SUM(tv.challengeSum),0) AS challengeSum FROM ( SELECT
ul.`USER_login_id` AS userId,ul.`USER_NAME` AS userName, COUNT(DISTINCT t.shop_id) AS shop , ci.customer_id AS shop_id,
${"ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(t.`h_quantity`),0)) AS saleQty,
ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(t.`h_amount`),0)) AS saleSum"}
${"ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(t.`quantity`),0)) AS saleQty,
ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(t.`amount`),0)) AS saleSum"}
FROM t_sale t JOIN customer_info ci ON ci.`CUSTOMER_ID`=t.`customer_id` JOIN shop_info si ON ci.`CUSTOMER_ID`=si.`CUSTOMER_ID` JOIN `shop_saler_mapping` ssm ON ssm.`shop_id`=t.`shop_id` JOIN user_login ul ON ul.`USER_LOGIN_ID`=ssm.`user_login_id` JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = si.party_id JOIN t_modelmap tm ON tm.`branch_model`=t.model AND tm.`party_id`=pa.`COUNTRY_ID` JOIN t_modelmap_channel tmc ON tmc.`branch_model`=tm.`branch_model` AND tmc.`party_id`=tm.`party_id` AND tmc.`customer_id`=ci.customer_id JOIN product pr ON pr.product_model=tm.`hq_model` AND pr.head_type_id =1
AND t.`datadate` BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} AND ssm.salertype='0' GROUP BY t.`shop_id`,ul.`USER_login_id` )sv
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT tst.`target_id` AS targetId,
${"COALESCE(SUM(tst.`h_amount`),0) AS targetSum ,COALESCE(SUM(tst.`h_tz_amount`),0) AS challengeSum "}
${"COALESCE(SUM(tst.`amount`),0) AS targetSum ,COALESCE(SUM(tst.`tz_amount`),0) AS challengeSum "}
FROM t_target tst WHERE tst.`class_id`=3 AND tst.TYPE=1 AND tst.`datadate` BETWEEN #{tBeginDate} AND #{tEndDate} GROUP BY tst.`target_id` ) tv ON sv.shop_id=tv.targetId
GROUP BY sv.userId

SELECT sv.userId, sv.userName AS userName,SUM( sv.shop) AS noOfShops ,
COALESCE(SUM(sv.saleQty),0) AS saleQty, COALESCE(SUM(sv.saleSum),0) AS saleSum, COALESCE(SUM(tv.targetSum),0) AS targetSum , COALESCE(SUM(tv.challengeSum),0) AS challengeSum FROM ( SELECT
ul.`USER_login_id` AS userId,ul.`USER_NAME` AS userName, COUNT(DISTINCT t.shop_id) AS shop , ci.customer_id AS shop_id,
${"ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(t.`h_quantity`),0)) AS saleQty,
ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(t.`h_amount`),0)) AS saleSum"}
${"ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(t.`quantity`),0)) AS saleQty,
ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(t.`amount`),0)) AS saleSum"}
FROM t_sale t JOIN customer_info ci ON ci.`CUSTOMER_ID`=t.`customer_id` JOIN shop_info si ON ci.`CUSTOMER_ID`=si.`CUSTOMER_ID` JOIN `shop_saler_mapping` ssm ON ssm.`shop_id`=t.`shop_id` JOIN user_login ul ON ul.`USER_LOGIN_ID`=ssm.`user_login_id` JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = si.party_id JOIN t_modelmap tm ON tm.`branch_model`=t.model AND tm.`party_id`=pa.`COUNTRY_ID` JOIN t_modelmap_channel tmc ON tmc.`branch_model`=tm.`branch_model` AND tmc.`party_id`=tm.`party_id` AND tmc.`customer_id`=ci.customer_id JOIN product pr ON pr.product_model=tm.`hq_model` AND pr.head_type_id =2
AND t.`datadate` BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} AND ssm.salertype='0' GROUP BY t.`shop_id`,ul.`USER_login_id` )sv
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT tst.`target_id` AS targetId,
${"COALESCE(SUM(tst.`h_amount`),0) AS targetSum ,COALESCE(SUM(tst.`h_tz_amount`),0) AS challengeSum "}
${"COALESCE(SUM(tst.`amount`),0) AS targetSum ,COALESCE(SUM(tst.`tz_amount`),0) AS challengeSum "}
FROM t_target tst WHERE tst.`class_id`=3 AND tst.TYPE=2 AND tst.`datadate` BETWEEN #{tBeginDate} AND #{tEndDate} GROUP BY tst.`target_id` ) tv ON sv.shop_id=tv.targetId
GROUP BY sv.userId

SELECT ul.`USER_login_id` AS userId,ul.`USER_NAME` AS userName
FROM `shop_saler_mapping` ssm JOIN shop_info si ON ssm.`shop_id`=si.`SHOP_ID` JOIN customer_info ci ON ci.`CUSTOMER_ID`=si.`CUSTOMER_ID` JOIN user_login ul ON ul.`USER_LOGIN_ID`=ssm.`user_login_id`
JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = si.party_id
AND ssm.salertype='0' GROUP BY ssm.`user_login_id`

SELECT sv.party_id,sv.partyId, sv.customer_name AS customer_name, sv.DEALER AS DEALER, sv.REG AS REG, sv.noOfShops noOfShops , sv.tvFps AS tvFps,
COALESCE(SUM(sv.saleQty),0) AS saleQty, COALESCE(SUM(sv.saleSum),0) AS saleSum, COALESCE(SUM(tv.targetSum),0) AS targetSum , COALESCE(SUM(tv.challengeSum),0) AS challengeSum FROM ( SELECT c.customer_id AS customer_id, PA.`PARTY_ID` AS party_id, c.`CUSTOMER_NAME` AS customer_name, COUNT(DISTINCT s.shop_id) AS noOfShops , COALESCE(SUM(smtv.fps ),0) AS tvFps, (SELECT p.party_name FROM party p WHERE p.party_id=pa.`PARENT_PARTY_ID`) REG, c.`CUSTOMER_NAME` AS DEALER ,
pa.`PARTY_ID` partyId, PA.`PARTY_NAME` AS AREA ,
${"ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(S.`h_quantity`),0)) AS saleQty, COALESCE(SUM(S.`h_amount`),0) AS saleSum "}
${"ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(S.`quantity`),0)) AS saleQty, COALESCE(SUM(S.`amount`),0) AS saleSum "}
FROM t_sale s
JOIN customer_info c ON s.customer_id=c.customer_id
JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = c.party_id JOIN t_modelmap tm ON tm.`branch_model`=s.model AND tm.`party_id`=pa.`COUNTRY_ID` JOIN t_modelmap_channel tmc ON tmc.`branch_model`=tm.`branch_model` AND tmc.`party_id`=tm.`party_id` AND tmc.`customer_id`=c.customer_id JOIN product pr ON pr.product_model=tm.`hq_model` AND pr.head_type_id =1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT cii.customer_id AS shop, COUNT(DISTINCT sm.`user_login_id`) AS FPS FROM shop_saler_mapping sm JOIN t_sale t FORCE INDEX(idx_sale_shopdatadate) ON t.`shop_id`=sm.`shop_id` JOIN customer_info cii ON cii.customer_id=t.`customer_id` JOIN shop_info psi ON psi.`customer_id`=cii.`customer_id` JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id=cii.party_id
AND t.`datadate` BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} AND sm.salertype='1' GROUP BY cii.`customer_id` ) smtv ON smtv.shop=c.`customer_id`
AND s.`datadate` BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate}
GROUP BY c.customer_id )sv
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT tst.`target_id` AS targetId,
${" COALESCE((tst.`h_amount`),0)AS targetSum , COALESCE((tst.`h_tz_amount`),0) AS challengeSum "}
${" COALESCE((tst.`amount`),0)AS targetSum , COALESCE((tst.`tz_amount`),0) AS challengeSum "}
FROM t_target tst WHERE tst.`class_id`=3 AND tst.TYPE=1 AND tst.`datadate` BETWEEN #{tBeginDate} AND #{tEndDate} ) tv ON sv.customer_id=tv.targetId
GROUP BY sv.customer_id

SELECT sv.party_id,sv.partyId, sv.customer_name AS customer_name, sv.DEALER AS DEALER, sv.REG AS REG, sv.noOfShops noOfShops , sv.tvFps AS tvFps,
COALESCE(SUM(sv.saleQty),0) AS saleQty, COALESCE(SUM(sv.saleSum),0) AS saleSum, COALESCE(SUM(tv.targetSum),0) AS targetSum , COALESCE(SUM(tv.challengeSum),0) AS challengeSum FROM ( SELECT c.customer_id AS customer_id, PA.`PARTY_ID` AS party_id, c.`CUSTOMER_NAME` AS customer_name, COUNT(DISTINCT s.shop_id) AS noOfShops , COALESCE(SUM(smtv.fps ),0) AS tvFps, (SELECT p.party_name FROM party p WHERE p.party_id=pa.`PARENT_PARTY_ID`) REG, c.`CUSTOMER_NAME` AS DEALER ,
pa.`PARTY_ID` partyId, PA.`PARTY_NAME` AS AREA ,
${"ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(S.`h_quantity`),0)) AS saleQty, COALESCE(SUM(S.`h_amount`),0) AS saleSum "}
${"ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(S.`quantity`),0)) AS saleQty, COALESCE(SUM(S.`amount`),0) AS saleSum "}
FROM t_sale s
JOIN customer_info c ON s.customer_id=c.customer_id
JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = c.party_id JOIN t_modelmap tm ON tm.`branch_model`=s.model AND tm.`party_id`=pa.`COUNTRY_ID` JOIN t_modelmap_channel tmc ON tmc.`branch_model`=tm.`branch_model` AND tmc.`party_id`=tm.`party_id` AND tmc.`customer_id`=c.customer_id JOIN product pr ON pr.product_model=tm.`hq_model` AND pr.head_type_id =2 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT cii.customer_id AS shop, COUNT(DISTINCT sm.`user_login_id`) AS FPS FROM shop_saler_mapping sm JOIN t_sale t FORCE INDEX(idx_sale_shopdatadate) ON t.`shop_id`=sm.`shop_id` JOIN customer_info cii ON cii.customer_id=t.`customer_id` JOIN shop_info psi ON psi.`customer_id`=cii.`customer_id` JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id=cii.party_id
AND t.`datadate` BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} AND sm.salertype='1' GROUP BY cii.`customer_id` ) smtv ON smtv.shop=c.`customer_id`
AND s.`datadate` BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate}
GROUP BY c.customer_id )sv
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT tst.`target_id` AS targetId,
${" COALESCE((tst.`h_amount`),0)AS targetSum , COALESCE((tst.`h_tz_amount`),0) AS challengeSum "}
${" COALESCE((tst.`amount`),0)AS targetSum , COALESCE((tst.`tz_amount`),0) AS challengeSum "}
FROM t_target tst WHERE tst.`class_id`=3 AND tst.TYPE=2 AND tst.`datadate` BETWEEN #{tBeginDate} AND #{tEndDate} ) tv ON sv.customer_id=tv.targetId
GROUP BY sv.customer_id

SELECT pa.party_name AS REG, c.`CUSTOMER_NAME` AS DEALER
FROM customer_info c
JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = c.party_id
GROUP BY PA.`PARTY_ID` ,c.`CUSTOMER_ID`

SELECT CASE WHEN PRODUCT_SPEC_ID LIKE '%CURVED%' THEN 'CURVED TV' WHEN PRODUCT_SPEC_ID LIKE '%QUHD%' THEN 'QUHD'
WHEN PRODUCT_SPEC_ID like '%UHD%' THEN 'UHD' WHEN PRODUCT_SPEC_ID LIKE '%SMART%' THEN 'SMART TV'
WHEN PRODUCT_SPEC_ID LIKE '%INTERNET%' THEN 'INTERNET TV'
WHEN PRODUCT_SPEC_ID LIKE '%DIGITAL%' THEN 'DIGITAL BASIC LED TV' WHEN PRODUCT_SPEC_ID LIKE '%BASIC LED%' THEN 'BASIC LED' ELSE 'settled unsettled' END SPEC ,
${"round(COALESCE(SUM(s.`h_quantity`),0)) AS quantity"}
${"round(COALESCE(SUM(s.`quantity`),0)) AS quantity"}
FROM t_sale s FORCE INDEX(idx_sale_shopdatadate) JOIN customer_info p ON p.`customer_ID`=s.`customer_id` JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = p.party_id JOIN t_modelmap tm ON tm.`branch_model`=s.model AND tm.`party_id`=pa.`COUNTRY_ID` JOIN t_modelmap_channel tmc ON tmc.`branch_model`=tm.`branch_model` AND tmc.`party_id`=tm.`party_id` AND tmc.`customer_id`=p.customer_id JOIN product pr ON pr.product_model=tm.`hq_model`
AND s.datadate BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} AND pr.head_type_id =1 GROUP BY SPEC ORDER BY SPEC

SELECT CASE WHEN PRODUCT_SPEC_ID LIKE '%CURVED%' THEN 'CURVED TV' WHEN PRODUCT_SPEC_ID LIKE '%QUHD%' THEN 'QUHD'
WHEN PRODUCT_SPEC_ID LIKE '%UHD%' THEN 'UHD' WHEN PRODUCT_SPEC_ID LIKE '%SMART%' THEN 'SMART TV'
WHEN PRODUCT_SPEC_ID LIKE '%INTERNET%' THEN 'INTERNET TV'
WHEN PRODUCT_SPEC_ID LIKE '%DIGITAL%' THEN 'DIGITAL BASIC LED TV' WHEN PRODUCT_SPEC_ID LIKE '%BASIC LED%' THEN 'BASIC LED' ELSE 'settled unsettled' END SPEC ,
${"ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(s.`h_quantity`),0)) AS quantity"}
${"ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(s.`quantity`),0)) AS quantity"}
FROM t_sale s FORCE INDEX(idx_sale_shopdatadate) JOIN customer_info p ON p.`customer_ID`=s.`customer_id` JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = p.party_id JOIN t_modelmap tm ON tm.`branch_model`=s.model AND tm.`party_id`=pa.`COUNTRY_ID` JOIN t_modelmap_channel tmc ON tmc.`branch_model`=tm.`branch_model` AND tmc.`party_id`=tm.`party_id` AND tmc.`customer_id`=p.customer_id JOIN product pr ON pr.product_model=tm.`hq_model`
AND s.datadate BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} AND pr.head_type_id =1
GROUP BY spec ORDER BY spec

SELECT CASE WHEN product_type LIKE '%Fission%' THEN 'Fission' WHEN product_type LIKE '%Window%' THEN 'Window'
ELSE 'settled unsettled' END SPEC ,
${"ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(s.`h_quantity`),0)) AS quantity"}
${"ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(s.`quantity`),0)) AS quantity"}
FROM t_sale s FORCE INDEX(idx_sale_shopdatadate) JOIN customer_info p ON p.`customer_ID`=s.`customer_id` JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = p.party_id JOIN t_modelmap tm ON tm.`branch_model`=s.model AND tm.`party_id`=pa.`COUNTRY_ID` JOIN t_modelmap_channel tmc ON tmc.`branch_model`=tm.`branch_model` AND tmc.`party_id`=tm.`party_id` AND tmc.`customer_id`=p.customer_id JOIN product pr ON pr.product_model=tm.`hq_model`
AND s.datadate BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} AND pr.head_type_id =2
GROUP BY spec ORDER BY spec

SELECT pa.`PARTY_ID`, pa.`PARTY_NAME` FROM t_sale s FORCE INDEX(idx_sale_shopdatadate) JOIN customer_info p ON p.`customer_ID`=s.`customer_id` JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = p.party_id JOIN t_modelmap tm ON tm.`branch_model`=s.model AND tm.`party_id`=pa.`COUNTRY_ID` JOIN t_modelmap_channel tmc ON tmc.`branch_model`=tm.`branch_model` AND tmc.`party_id`=tm.`party_id` AND tmc.`customer_id`=p.customer_id JOIN product pr ON pr.product_model=tm.`hq_model` AND pr.head_type_id =1
AND s.datadate BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY pa.`PARTY_ID`

SELECT sv.userId, SUM( sv.shop) AS noOfShops ,sv.userName AS userName,
COALESCE(SUM(sv.saleQty),0) AS saleQty, COALESCE(SUM(sv.saleSum),0) AS saleSum, COALESCE(SUM(tv.targetSum),0) AS targetSum , COALESCE(SUM(tv.challengeSum),0) AS challengeSum FROM ( SELECT ul.`USER_login_id` AS userId, ul.`USER_NAME` AS userName, ci.`customer_id`, COUNT(DISTINCT t.`shop_id`) AS shop ,
${"ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(t.`h_quantity`),0)) AS saleQty,
COALESCE(SUM(t.`h_amount`),0) AS saleSum "}
${"ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(t.`quantity`),0)) AS saleQty,
COALESCE(SUM(t.`amount`),0) AS saleSum "}
FROM t_sale t JOIN customer_info ci ON t.`customer_id`=ci.`customer_id`
JOIN shop_info si ON ci.`customer_id`=si.`customer_id`
JOIN `shop_saler_mapping` ssm ON ssm.`shop_id`=t.`shop_id` JOIN user_login ul ON ul.`USER_LOGIN_ID`=ssm.`user_login_id`
JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = si.party_id JOIN t_modelmap tm ON tm.`branch_model`=t.model AND tm.`party_id`=pa.`COUNTRY_ID` JOIN t_modelmap_channel tmc ON tmc.`branch_model`=tm.`branch_model` AND tmc.`party_id`=tm.`party_id` AND tmc.`customer_id`=ci.customer_id JOIN product pr ON pr.product_model=tm.`hq_model` AND pr.head_type_id =1
AND t.datadate BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} AND ssm.salertype='2' GROUP BY ci.`customer_id`, ul.`USER_login_id` )sv
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT tst.`target_id` AS targetId,
${"COALESCE(SUM(tst.`h_amount`),0) AS targetSum ,COALESCE(SUM(tst.`h_tz_amount`),0) AS challengeSum "}
${"COALESCE(SUM(tst.`amount`),0) AS targetSum ,COALESCE(SUM(tst.`tz_amount`),0) AS challengeSum "}
FROM t_target tst WHERE tst.`class_id`=3 AND TST.TYPE=1 AND tst.datadate BETWEEN #{tBeginDate} AND #{tEndDate} GROUP BY tst.`target_id` ) tv ON sv.customer_id=tv.targetId
GROUP BY sv.userId

SELECT sv.userId, SUM( sv.shop) AS noOfShops ,sv.userName AS userName,
COALESCE(SUM(sv.saleQty),0) AS saleQty, COALESCE(SUM(sv.saleSum),0) AS saleSum, COALESCE(SUM(tv.targetSum),0) AS targetSum , COALESCE(SUM(tv.challengeSum),0) AS challengeSum FROM ( SELECT ul.`USER_login_id` AS userId, ul.`USER_NAME` AS userName, ci.`customer_id`, COUNT(DISTINCT t.`shop_id`) AS shop ,
${"ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(t.`h_quantity`),0)) AS saleQty,
COALESCE(SUM(t.`h_amount`),0) AS saleSum "}
${"ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(t.`quantity`),0)) AS saleQty,
COALESCE(SUM(t.`amount`),0) AS saleSum "}
FROM t_sale t JOIN customer_info ci ON t.`customer_id`=ci.`customer_id`
JOIN shop_info si ON ci.`customer_id`=si.`customer_id`
JOIN `shop_saler_mapping` ssm ON ssm.`shop_id`=t.`shop_id` JOIN user_login ul ON ul.`USER_LOGIN_ID`=ssm.`user_login_id`
JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = si.party_id JOIN t_modelmap tm ON tm.`branch_model`=t.model AND tm.`party_id`=pa.`COUNTRY_ID` JOIN t_modelmap_channel tmc ON tmc.`branch_model`=tm.`branch_model` AND tmc.`party_id`=tm.`party_id` AND tmc.`customer_id`=ci.customer_id JOIN product pr ON pr.product_model=tm.`hq_model` AND pr.head_type_id =2
AND t.datadate BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} AND ssm.salertype='2' GROUP BY ci.`customer_id`, ul.`USER_login_id` )sv
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT tst.`target_id` AS targetId,
${"COALESCE(SUM(tst.`h_amount`),0) AS targetSum ,COALESCE(SUM(tst.`h_tz_amount`),0) AS challengeSum "}
${"COALESCE(SUM(tst.`amount`),0) AS targetSum ,COALESCE(SUM(tst.`tz_amount`),0) AS challengeSum "}
FROM t_target tst WHERE tst.`class_id`=3 AND TST.TYPE=2 AND tst.datadate BETWEEN #{tBeginDate} AND #{tEndDate} GROUP BY tst.`target_id` ) tv ON sv.customer_id=tv.targetId
GROUP BY sv.userId

SELECT ul.`USER_login_id` AS userId, ul.`USER_NAME` AS userName
FROM `shop_saler_mapping` ssm JOIN shop_info si ON ssm.`shop_id`=si.`SHOP_ID` JOIN customer_info ci ON si.`CUSTOMER_ID`=ci.`CUSTOMER_ID`
JOIN user_login ul ON ul.`USER_LOGIN_ID`=ssm.`user_login_id` JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = si.party_id
AND ssm.salertype='2'
GROUP BY ssm.`user_login_id`

SELECT DISTINCT ssm.`user_login_id` AS userId, pa.`PARTY_NAME` FROM party pa
JOIN shop_info si ON pa.`PARTY_ID`= si.`PARTY_ID` JOIN customer_info ci ON ci.`CUSTOMER_ID`=si.`CUSTOMER_ID`
JOIN `shop_saler_mapping` ssm ON ssm.`shop_id`=si.`shop_id`

SELECT ssm.`user_login_id` AS USER, COALESCE(SUM(s.fps ),0) AS TVFPS FROM shop_saler_mapping ssm, (SELECT DISTINCT sm.shop_id AS shop, COUNT(DISTINCT sm.`user_login_id`) AS FPS FROM shop_saler_mapping sm JOIN t_sale t ON t.`shop_id`=sm.`shop_id` JOIN customer_info ci ON ci.`CUSTOMER_ID`= t.`CUSTOMER_ID` JOIN shop_info si ON si.CUSTOMER_ID=ci.`CUSTOMER_ID`
JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id=si.party_id JOIN t_modelmap tm ON tm.`branch_model`=t.`model` AND tm.`party_id`=pa.`COUNTRY_ID` JOIN product pt ON pt.`PRODUCT_model`=tm.`hq_model` AND pt.`head_type_id`=1
AND t.datadate BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} AND sm.salertype='1' GROUP BY t.`shop_id` ) s WHERE s.shop IN(ssm.`shop_id`) GROUP BY ssm.`user_login_id`

SELECT ssm.`user_login_id` AS USER, COALESCE(SUM(s.fps ),0) AS TVFPS FROM shop_saler_mapping ssm, (SELECT DISTINCT sm.shop_id AS shop, COUNT(DISTINCT sm.`user_login_id`) AS FPS FROM shop_saler_mapping sm JOIN t_sale t ON t.`shop_id`=sm.`shop_id` JOIN shop_info si ON si.shop_id=t.shop_id JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id=si.party_id JOIN t_modelmap tm ON tm.`branch_model`=t.`model` AND tm.`party_id`=pa.`COUNTRY_ID` JOIN product pt ON pt.`PRODUCT_model`=tm.`hq_model` AND pt.`head_type_id`=1
AND t.datadate BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} AND sm.salertype='1' GROUP BY t.`shop_id` ) s WHERE s.shop IN(ssm.`shop_id`) GROUP BY ssm.`user_login_id`

SELECT ul.`USER_login_id` AS userId,ul.`USER_NAME` AS userName FROM t_sale t FORCE INDEX(idx_sale_shopdatadate)
join customer_info ci on ci.customer_id=t.customer_id JOIN shop_info si ON ci.customer_id=si.`customer_id` JOIN `shop_saler_mapping` ssm ON ssm.`shop_id`=t.`shop_id` JOIN user_login ul ON ul.`USER_LOGIN_ID`=ssm.`user_login_id`
JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = si.party_id JOIN t_modelmap tm ON tm.`branch_model`=t.model AND tm.`party_id`=pa.`COUNTRY_ID` JOIN t_modelmap_channel tmc ON tmc.`branch_model`=tm.`branch_model` AND tmc.`party_id`=tm.`party_id` AND tmc.`customer_id`=ci.customer_id JOIN product pr ON pr.product_model=tm.`hq_model` AND pr.head_type_id =1
AND t.datadate BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} AND ssm.salertype='0' GROUP BY ssm.`user_login_id`

SELECT ul.`USER_login_id` AS userId,ul.`USER_NAME` AS userName
FROM `shop_saler_mapping` ssm JOIN shop_info si ON ssm.`shop_id`=si.`SHOP_ID` join customer_info ci on ci.customer_id=si.customer_id JOIN user_login ul ON ul.`USER_LOGIN_ID`=ssm.`user_login_id`
JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = si.party_id
AND ssm.salertype='2'
GROUP BY ssm.`user_login_id`

SELECT c.`CUSTOMER_NAME` AS DEALER,
${"ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(s.`h_quantity`),0)) AS saleQty"}
${"ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(s.`quantity`),0)) AS saleQty"}
FROM t_sale s FORCE INDEX(idx_sale_shopdatadate)
JOIN customer_info c ON s.customer_id=c.customer_id JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = c.party_id
JOIN t_modelmap tm ON tm.`branch_model`=s.model AND tm.`party_id`=pa.`COUNTRY_ID` JOIN t_modelmap_channel tmc ON tmc.`branch_model`=tm.`branch_model` AND tmc.`party_id`=tm.`party_id` AND tmc.`customer_id`=c.customer_id JOIN product pr ON pr.product_model=tm.`hq_model` AND pr.head_type_id =2
AND s.datadate BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY c.`CUSTOMER_NAME`

SELECT DISTINCT c.`CUSTOMER_NAME` AS DEALER FROM t_sale s
JOIN customer_info c ON s.customer_id=c.customer_id JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = p.party_id

SELECT c.`CUSTOMER_NAME` AS DEALER,c.customer_id SHOP_ID FROM customer_info c JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = c.party_id
GROUP BY c.`CUSTOMER_NAME` ,c.customer_id ORDER BY c.customer_id

SELECT p.`customer_id` SHOP_ID,
ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(s.`quantity`),0)) AS quantity, pr.`product_line` FROM `t_inventory` s JOIN customer_info p ON p.`customer_ID`=s.`customer_id` JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = p.party_id JOIN t_modelmap tm ON tm.`branch_model`=s.model AND tm.`party_id`=pa.`COUNTRY_ID` JOIN t_modelmap_channel tmc ON tmc.`branch_model`=tm.`branch_model` AND tmc.`party_id`=tm.`party_id` AND tmc.`customer_id`=p.customer_id JOIN product pr ON pr.product_model=tm.`hq_model` AND pr.head_type_id =1
and s.`class_id`=1 AND s.datadate BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate}
GROUP BY pr.`product_line`,s.`customer_id`

SELECT ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(s.`quantity`),0)) AS quantity, pr.`product_line` FROM `t_inventory` s JOIN customer_info p ON p.`customer_ID`=s.`customer_id` JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = p.party_id JOIN t_modelmap tm ON tm.`branch_model`=s.model AND tm.`party_id`=pa.`COUNTRY_ID` JOIN t_modelmap_channel tmc ON tmc.`branch_model`=tm.`branch_model` AND tmc.`party_id`=tm.`party_id` AND tmc.`customer_id`=p.customer_id JOIN product pr ON pr.product_model=tm.`hq_model` AND pr.head_type_id =1
AND s.`class_id`=1 AND s.datadate BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} group by pr.`product_line`

SELECT ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(s.`quantity`),0)) AS quantity,pr.`product_line` FROM sample_record s JOIN customer_info p ON p.`customer_ID`=s.`customer_id` JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = p.party_id JOIN t_modelmap tm ON tm.`branch_model`=s.model AND tm.`party_id`=pa.`COUNTRY_ID` JOIN t_modelmap_channel tmc ON tmc.`branch_model`=tm.`branch_model` AND tmc.`party_id`=tm.`party_id` AND tmc.`customer_id`=p.customer_id JOIN product pr ON pr.product_model=tm.`hq_model` AND pr.head_type_id =1
AND s.`class_id`=1 AND s.datadate BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} group by pr.`product_line`
SELECT p.`PARTY_NAME` FROM user_login u JOIN party p ON p.`PARTY_ID`=u.`PARTY_ID` WHERE u.user_login_id=#{userId}

SELECT pa.`PARTY_ID`, ul.`USER_NAME` AS userName FROM user_role_mapping ur JOIN user_login ul ON ul.`USER_LOGIN_ID`=ur.`USER_LOGIN_ID` JOIN role_data_permission udp ON udp.`ROLE_ID`=ur.`ROLE_ID` JOIN party pa ON pa.`PARTY_ID`=udp.`PERMISSION_VALUE`
AND ur.`ROLE_ID` LIKE '%REGIONAL%'

SELECT urm.`USER_LOGIN_ID` AS userId,pa.party_Name AS PARTY_NAME ,pa.`PARTY_ID`,pa.`PARENT_PARTY_ID` FROM party pa,`role_data_permission` rdp,`user_role_mapping` urm
AND pa.`PARTY_ID`=rdp.`PERMISSION_VALUE` AND rdp.`PERMISSION_TYPE`='PARTY' AND urm.`ROLE_ID`=rdp.`ROLE_ID` AND pa.`PARTY_ID` NOT IN (SELECT p.`PARENT_PARTY_ID`FROM party p)

SELECT p.`product_line` ,
${"ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(s.`h_quantity`),0)) AS quantity, COALESCE(SUM(s.`h_amount`),0) AS amount"}
${"ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(s.`quantity`),0)) AS quantity, COALESCE(SUM(s.`amount`),0) AS amount"}
FROM t_sale s
JOIN customer_info si ON s.`customer_ID`=si.`customer_id`
JOIN party pa ON pa.party_id = si.party_id
JOIN t_modelmap tm ON tm.`branch_model`=s.model AND tm.`party_id`=pa.`COUNTRY_ID` JOIN t_modelmap_channel tmc ON tmc.`branch_model`=tm.`branch_model` AND tmc.`party_id`=tm.`party_id` AND tmc.`customer_id`=si.customer_id JOIN product p ON p.product_model=tm.`hq_model` AND p.head_type_id =1
JOIN core_product cp ON p.`product_line`=cp.`product_line`
AND cp.`country_id`=#{countryId} AND s.`datadate` BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY p.`product_line`
select u.`PARTY_ID` AS countryId from user_login u where u.`USER_LOGIN_ID`=#{userId}
